column4: hey, can someone tell me if its possible to use unity and smth other? or unity allow to have 2nd bar (bottom gnome like) and i'd like it to work like this: i have few apps that are usially a single instance or not more than 3 - these could be started and be visible on unity bar (by default all) - but i'd like to have few apps that should be visible on that gnome-like panel (i coulkd specify
